long_description: The Osprey Grab Bag accessory pocket adds capacity to your pack and provides quick access to snacks and other essentials when you are on the go. Attaches to any pack with cross-shoulder attachment, or wear it alone around your waist. Internal pocket secures important items; external stretch mesh pocket is perfect for quick access to essentials.
short_description: The Osprey Grab Bag accessory pocket adds capacity to your pack and provides quick access to snacks and other essentials when you are on the go.
